025    
026    package com.softwarementors.extjs.djn.router.processor;
027    
028    import com.softwarementors.extjs.djn.ExceptionUtils;
029    import com.softwarementors.extjs.djn.router.TransferType;
030    
031    import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
032    
033    public abstract class ErrorResponseData extends ResponseData {
034      @edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.SuppressWarnings( value="URF_UNREAD_FIELD", justification="Passed to JSON side only")
035      @NonNull /* package */ String message;
036      @edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.SuppressWarnings( value="URF_UNREAD_FIELD", justification="Passed to JSON side only")
037      @NonNull /* package */ String where;
038      @edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.SuppressWarnings( value="URF_UNREAD_FIELD", justification="Passed to JSON side only")
039      @NonNull /* package */ ServerExceptionInformation serverException;
040      /*
041      @NonNull private String serverExceptionMessage;
042      @NonNull private String serverExceptionType;
043      @NonNull private List<ExceptionInformation> exceptionsInformation = new ArrayList<ExceptionInformation>();
044      */
045    
046      protected ErrorResponseData( Throwable exception, boolean debugOn ) {
047        super( TransferType.SERVER_EXCEPTION);
048        assert exception != null;
049        
050        Throwable reportedException = ExceptionUtils.getFirstRelevantExceptionToReport(exception);
051        String message = ExceptionUtils.getExceptionMessage(reportedException);
052        String where = ExceptionUtils.getExceptionWhere(reportedException, debugOn);
053        
054        this.message = message;
055        this.where = where;
056        this.serverException = new ServerExceptionInformation( exception, debugOn );
057      }
058    }
